snippet: A "deep state" metaphor that alleges shadowy forces behind the scenes seems to be ascendant as a way to explain present American realities.
lead_paragraph: A "deep state" metaphor that alleges shadowy forces behind the scenes seems to be ascendant as a way to explain present American realities.

headline.main: Examining Who Runs the United States
